de.edgesoft.refereemanager.controller

Class PreferencesDialogController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.edgesoft.refereemanager.controller.PreferencesDialogController

  • public class PreferencesDialogController
extends java.lang.Object

    Controller for preferences edit dialog scene.
